m_szDocTitle: Qin EV Could Be 'Game-Changer' In US, Says BYD America VP
m_szDocSumamry: Originally published on EV Obsession . The BYD America Vice President, Michael Austin, was recently quoted in an interview with Autoblog as saying that the (possible) introduction of the BYD Qin electric vehicle to the US would be a game-changer. Of course, the Vice President also noted that the company currently has no plans to bring the model to the US market — as the time isn’t right yet for electric vehicles (EVs) in the US market, owing to insufficient incentives and charging infrastructure. “If I brought (the Qin) to the US, it’d be a game-changer,” are the exact words that Austin used.
